title: Flow Rate Formula
text: Use the formula for volume flow rate: $$Q=A v$$ where Q is the volume flow rate, A is the cross-sectional area, and v is the speed of the flow.

title: The Equation for Conservation of Flow Rate
text: Since the flow rate must be conserved, we have: $$A_1 v_1=A_2 v_2$$

title: Use the Conservation of Flow Rate to Find $$A_2$$
text: We've calculated in the previous problem that $$A_1=2.01\times {10}^{\left(-4\right)}$$, thus solve for $$A_2$$: $$2.01\times {10}^{\left(-4\right)}\times2=15A_2$$

title: Calculate the Radius and Diameter of the Nozzle
text: As $$A={pir}^2=2.68\times {10}^{\left(-5\right)}$$, solve for $$r$$, and then as $$d=2r$$, calculate for the nozzle’s inside diameter $$d$$. Remember to convert the unit from $$m$$ to cm.
